rpOptBioDes’s Documentation¶

Indices and tables¶

  • Index

Introduction¶

Welcome to rpOptBioDes’s documentation. This tool provides a docker that extends the original doebase project to parse rpSBML files and an SBOL. The original projects explores the design space of combination of promoters, coding sequences, terminators and RBS of the heterologous pathway generated by RetroPath2.0.

docker build -t brsynth/rpoptbiodes-standalone .

You can run the docker using the following command:

python run.py -input test/test_rpGlobalScore.tar -input_format tar -input_sbol test/test.sbol -output test/test_output.tar

API¶

class rpToolServe.runOptBioDes_hdd¶

Calculate the design of experiment combination of genetic parts

Parameters

  • inputTar (str) – The path to the input TAR collection of rpSBML

  • inputSbol (str) – The path to the input SBOL file

  • outputTar (str) – The path to the output TAR collection of rpSOL

  • pathway_id (str) – The Groups id of the heterologous pathway (Default: rp_pathway)

  • maxgenes (int) – Maximum number of genes selected per step (Default: 5)

  • libsize (int) – Desired size of the combinatorial library (Default: 32)

  • file_parts (str) – The file with a URI list of sbol parts in Synbiohub (Default: None)

Return type

bool

Returns

The success or failure of the function

class rpTool.readRPpathway_selenzyme¶

Function that reads rpSBML files and returns selenzyme information

Parameters

  • sbml (libsbml.model) – The libsbml object

  • pathway_id (str) – The Groups id of the heterologous pathway

Return type

dict

Returns

The rpSelenzume information

class rpTool.selenzinfo2table¶

Convert the selenzyme_info dictionary into the input table: Name, Type, Part, Step

It assumes that pathway steps are in reverse direction and are called as RP1, RP2, etc.

Parameters

  • si (dict) – The selenzyme information of the heterologous pathway

  • maxgenes (int) – The maximal number of genes

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

Returns

The table of parts

class rpTool.refparts_default¶

Default set of gene regulatory parts in E. coli

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

Returns

The table of default promoter, terminators, etc… parts

class run.main¶

The docker call to calculate the design of experiment combination of genetic parts

Parameters

  • inputfile (str) – The path to the input file

  • input_format – The input type of the gile. Suported input: tar, sbml

  • input_sbol (str) – The path to the input SBOL file

  • output (str) – The path to the output file

  • pathway_id (str) – The Groups id of the heterologous pathway (Default: rp_pathway)

  • max_variants (int) – Maximum number of genes selected per step (Default: 5)

  • lib_size (int) – Desired size of the combinatorial library (Default: 32)

  • input_parts (str) – The file with a URI list of sbol parts in Synbiohub (Default: None)

Return type

bool

Returns

The success or failure of the function
